channel.title: How do i add customs?
channel.description: i wanna make some custom skillcapes e.g. mod cape, admin cape, owner cape and more so if u know how to do it plz tell me thanks :)

item.title: How do i add customs?
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Alright well first of all this should be in the client help section.

And first thing you need to do is get the models

You need the equip model
You need the drop model

You can get these models by searching the forums.
Once you get them leave them in the .rar file type

Go to you client folder and put them into your models folder
Now you need the ints and shit.

Where ever you got the models from they should have the ints
So go into class8.java
And add your item ints
Save that then compile it
Go onto your game and type this in “add model 13699” and “13698” (Without the “”)(And the 13699 is your model id so it will be different for them all"

Once you did that you should be set.

Now all you have to do is give the item its stats
Go into your server file and go to config
Then go to item.cfg (I think its cfg)
Now go to the very bottom(or where ever you want it)
And type in its stats and item id(Use the ones that are already there for a guide)
Then save it compile and there you should have it.

Read full topic
